participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and humorous, enjoys outdoor activities and has a playful sense of humor.
participant_1.background: Lives in Colorado, passionate about mechanical engineering and outdoor sports like hiking and rock climbing.

participant_2.name: Sophie

content.text: because colorado is where i do live
there is nothing better than being a mechanical engineer in colorado! wish i have a job
i've a black lab named trooper because it sounds like booper
and it sounds awesome when i shout it's name when i go hiking in the spring because i like it
my favorite activity is rock climbing up your mom because she's that fat
